title: free skin codes
body:
can someone help me get some free skin codes if there are any??
send me the link if it is legit. thank you i am hoping for arctic ops Varus skin.

replies.body: Although you can get (Dreadknight) Garen, (Riot Girl) Tristana, and (Unchained) Alistar for free through Riot's accounts on Twitter, Facebook, and Youtube. Just follow, like, and subscribe to each respectively.

Hey AmazingArrow,

Unfortunately, we've deactivated all older skin codes, so there's no way to obtains such as PAX Sivir, Arctic Ops Varus, or any of the older skin codes. New skin codes (ones given away at events, for example) expire shortly after they're handed out.
